mapper.sql: ORDER_ID, PAY_AMOUNT, STATUS, USER_ID, DATA_CREATE_TIME, DATA_EDIT_TIME, DATA_COM_TIME, DATA_CAL_TIME, SHOP_ID
mapper.select: SELECT NVL( COUNT(1), 0) AS totalTradedOrders, --总成交订单 NVL( SUM(case when trunc(sysdate) = trunc("ORDER_MASTER".DATA_CREATE_TIME) then 1 else 0 end), 0) AS orderToday, NVL( SUM(case when "ORDER_MASTER".USER_ID = #{userId} and trunc(sysdate) = trunc("ORDER_MASTER".DATA_CREATE_TIME) then "ORDER_MASTER".PAY_AMOUNT else 0 end ), 0) AS spendToday, NVL( SUM(case when "ORDER_MASTER".SHOP_ID = #{userId} and trunc(sysdate) = trunc("ORDER_MASTER".DATA_CREATE_TIME) then "ORDER_MASTER".PAY_AMOUNT else 0 end ), 0) AS todaySEarnings FROM XINGYING_SHOP.ORDER_MASTER WHERE ("ORDER_MASTER".USER_ID = #{userId} OR "ORDER_MASTER".SHOP_ID = #{userId}) AND "ORDER_MASTER".STATUS = '5'--查找订单完成的

SELECT NVL( COUNT(1), 0) AS submitOrders, --当天提交订单 NVL( SUM(case when "ORDER_MASTER".STATUS = '5' then 1 else 0 end), 0) AS successfulOrder,--成功的订单 NVL( SUM(case when "ORDER_MASTER".USER_ID = #{userId} AND "ORDER_MASTER".STATUS = '5' then "ORDER_MASTER".PAY_AMOUNT else 0 end ), 0) AS outcome, --当天支出 NVL( SUM(case when "ORDER_MASTER".SHOP_ID = #{userId} AND "ORDER_MASTER".STATUS = '5' then "ORDER_MASTER".PAY_AMOUNT else 0 end ), 0) AS income --当天收入 FROM XINGYING_SHOP.ORDER_MASTER WHERE ("ORDER_MASTER".USER_ID = #{userId} OR "ORDER_MASTER".SHOP_ID = #{userId}) AND trunc("ORDER_MASTER".DATA_CREATE_TIME) = trunc(#{orderTime}) --查询限定时间
